list.abs: tasting notes : aroma of stone fruits ( plum and morello cherry ) , of leather and sous-bois . this famous growth presents a complex and full-bodied structure noted for solid tannins .品尝特征：李子和樱桃的果香夹杂着一丝皮革的味道。酒体结构复杂，单宁饱满，尽显大家风范。

Prunus cerasus - 欧洲酸樱桃,又称莫利洛黑樱桃(Morello Cherry)或酸樱桃。分布于欧洲及亚洲西南。 Prunus cerasifera - 红叶李,别名紫叶李、樱桃李。分布于欧洲.
